experience: You and Jesse both know Earl R. Smith II, PhD, Bart Rupert, and 16 others
I hired a middle-aged guy who never worked a day in his life...
Well he was a bartender in his 20's...
Everything about him was a glaring
3 other candidates were also interviewing for this inside sales career.
Why did he get the offer letter?
Standard interview questions aren't the solution anymore because candidates are more about purpose than paychecks.
I learned his real story, then studied his actions.
1) He made me laugh during the phone interview
2) He followed up with a personalized thank you email requesting a face to face
After the face to face interview he sent another follow up email:
2) inserted a quote from my book
2 days later, he left a follow up voicemail.
Sales reps w years of experience don't even do that.
If you want top performers on your team:
Are you hiring based on paper instead of person?
Want to know how is doing 3 months into his new career?
This factory covers it's floor in soap.
If someone told you that you would lose your right arm at 6 pm today, unless you came up with $500, what would you do?
Would you tell them it's just a bit too much money?
Would you say I'm really not in a position to do that right now?
Of course not!  Why, because it's IMPORTANT to you and you can't see yourself living without your right arm.
That's the way you need to look at personal growth and how you run your business.
You would do whatever it takes to get that $500.  You could find one person to loan it to you or find 10 to loan you $50.  It's never a money problem, it's an idea problem.
The reason you are where you are today is because of the decisions you make.  People will spend ridiculous amounts of money on things that retard their growth and limit their success.
Fantasy Football, Cable TV, Gambling, Starbucks....the list goes on.
When you eventually realize that the best investement you can make is in yourself, your skills, and your personal growth, then and only then will you see the results you are constantly hoping for.
"You don't get better by chance, you get better by change."

August 31, 2017, Eva was a client of Jesse’s

Since working with Jesse, I have been able to gain clarity on which direction to take my business and relationships in my life. I have found through Jesse's guidance that not only being specific about my desires and ridding of any negative emotions and limitations in my life have had a tremendous impact in my transformation. I have been able to change my course and I am constantly and easily manifesting more clients, more peace and more confidence in creating the business of my dreams as well as being able to do the things that I love like spending time with friends, family, and making money while traveling. These desires came to fruition through making my own decisions on how I want to create and live my life. And so can you. Jesse simply coaches you through your challenges whether it's in sales, business development or accountability. Stop making things hard for yourself. I highly recommend working with Jesse because it has truly been one of the best experiences I've had in continually reaching and setting new goals in my personal and business life.

summary: Have you ever felt sales resistance?  Either resistance from your prospect, or felt your own resistance to making calls or any part of the sales process?What I do, is help you increase your sales without being pushy or salesy, by teaching little known influence and communication skills to use in your sales.And advanced productivity and performance skills to use with yourself!  Hey it's Jesse,   I'm a Hypnotherapist and NLP based Sales Coach in San Diego.  And for over 7 years I have been helping ambitious people perform at their best, so you they achieve the results in sales you feel you're REALLY capable of.    I'm an expert in the  psychology of helping sales people transform their habits and deep mindsets to make dramatic changes both internally and externally with lightning speed. So you can make more sales without being pushy or cold calling.  I'm a Certified Trainer of NLP and Certified Hypnotherapist with expertise in authentic influence and peak business performance. When you get coaching with Jesse, you will learn:- Delete the mental programs that kill your sales and lowers your income- How to reprogram your mind for easy and automatic success- Advanced sales and money psychology - Learn the mental techniques used by Olympic athletes and Navy SEALS- How to wake up productive and start your day right- How to overcome procrastination and create powerful habits- How to identify & eliminate the INVISIBLE blocks that have been holding you back- How to set goals and actually get them DONE Jesse MartinSpecialties: Sales expert, high ticket sales training, best sales coach in san diego , motivation, psychology, mindset, NLP, service, selling systems, real estate agents to sell, consulting, coaching, hiring and evaluating sales people and sales teams, and delivering keynote speeches on sales, motivation, and evaluating sales people, effective sales management and other sales related topics. Striving to be the best sales coach in San Diego.
name: Jesse Martin
title: ✪ Teaching People to Sell More with Honesty, Eliminate Sales Resistance in Others, and Master Your Mindset with NLP ✪
